name: Mohji
effect: If you have 2 or more Characters with a base cost of 5 or more, this Character gains [Blocker] and +1 cost. (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [On K.O.] If your Leader is [Buggy] and you have 3 or less cards in your hand, draw 1 card.
